languages.text: "Я дозволяю вмешиваться в мои разговоры тем, кто может сказать что-то ценное. Сейчас узнаем, стоило ли". {n}Теодора склоняет голову набок. Ее губы расползаются в щучью улыбку.{/n} "Это {name}, втор{mf|ой|ая} кандидат{mf||ка} на звание моего преемника". {n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} бросает на вас властный взгляд, хищный и тяжеловесный.{/n} "Шаг вперед, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Я дозволяю вмешиваться в мои разговоры тем, кто может сказать что-то ценное. Сейчас узнаем, стоило ли". {n}Теодора склоняет голову набок. Ее губы расползаются в щучью улыбку.{/n} "Это {name}, втор{mf|ой|ая} кандидат{mf||ка} на звание моего преемника". {n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} бросает на вас властный взгляд, хищный и тяжеловесный.{/n} "Шаг вперед, {name}".

languages.text: "I give that permission to those with something of substance to say. Let us see if it was worth it." {n}Theodora tilts her head. Her lips stretch into a cold smile.{/n} "This is {name}, the second candidate for the title of my successor." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} regards you with a look that is imperious, predatory, and oppressive.{/n} "Step forward, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Я дозволяю вмешиваться в мои разговоры тем, кто может сказать что-то ценное. Сейчас узнаем, стоило ли". {n}Теодора склоняет голову набок. Ее губы расползаются в щучью улыбку.{/n} "Это {name}, втор{mf|ой|ая} кандидат{mf||ка} на звание моего преемника". {n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} бросает на вас властный взгляд, хищный и тяжеловесный.{/n} "Шаг вперед, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "I give that permission to those who have something of substance to say. Let us see if it was worth it." {n}Theodora tilts her head. Her lips stretch into a cold smile.{/n} "This is {name}, the second candidate for the title of my successor." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} regards you with a look that is imperious, predatory, and oppressive.{/n} "Take a step forward, {name}. Time for a small test."

"I give that permission to those with something of substance to say. Let us see if it was worth it." {n}Theodora tilts her head. Her lips stretch into a cold smile.{/n} "This is {name}, the second candidate for the title of my successor." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} regards you with a look that is imperious, predatory, and oppressive.{/n} "Step forward, {name}."

languages.text: “我允许有话要说的人畅所欲言，咱们来看看这么做值不值得吧。” {n}西奥多拉歪着头，嘴角露出了冰冷的微笑。{/n}“这位是{name}，我的第二位继承人候选。”{n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}以充满专横、掠夺与压迫的眼神看着你。{/n}“过来吧，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "I give that permission to those with something of substance to say. Let us see if it was worth it." {n}Theodora tilts her head. Her lips stretch into a cold smile.{/n} "This is {name}, the second candidate for the title of my successor." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} regards you with a look that is imperious, predatory, and oppressive.{/n} "Step forward, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “我允许有话要说的人畅所欲言，咱们来看看这么做值不值得吧。” {n}西奥多拉歪着头，嘴角露出了冰冷的微笑。{/n}“这位是{name}，我的第二位继承人候选。”{n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}以充满专横、掠夺与压迫的眼神看着你。{/n}“过来吧，{name}。”

languages.text: «Concedo ese permiso a quienes tienen algo importante que decir. Veamos si ha merecido la pena». {n}Theodora ladea la cabeza. Sus labios forman una sonrisa fría.{/n} «Est{mf|e|a} es {name}, {mf|el|la} segund{mf|o|a} candidat{mf|o|a} para mi sucesión». {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} te lanza una mirada imperiosa, depredadora y opresiva.{/n} «Acércate, {name}».
languages.original_text: "I give that permission to those with something of substance to say. Let us see if it was worth it." {n}Theodora tilts her head. Her lips stretch into a cold smile.{/n} "This is {name}, the second candidate for the title of my successor." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} regards you with a look that is imperious, predatory, and oppressive.{/n} "Step forward, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Concedo ese permiso a quienes tienen algo importante que decir. Veamos si ha merecido la pena». {n}Theodora ladea la cabeza. Sus labios forman una sonrisa fría.{/n} «Est{mf|e|a} es {name}, {mf|el|la} segund{mf|o|a} candidat{mf|o|a} para mi sucesión». {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} te lanza una mirada imperiosa, depredadora y opresiva.{/n} «Acércate, {name}».

languages.text: 「実のある意見を言いたい者にはその許可を与える。それだけの価値があるかどうか聞かせてもらおう」{n}シオドーラは首を傾げる。彼女の唇は冷たいほほえみに代わる。{/n}「この者は、{name}です。私の後継者の第二候補者だ」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}はごう慢で、略奪的で、抑圧的な目であなたを見る。{/n}「こちらへ、{name}」
languages.original_text: "I give that permission to those with something of substance to say. Let us see if it was worth it." {n}Theodora tilts her head. Her lips stretch into a cold smile.{/n} "This is {name}, the second candidate for the title of my successor." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} regards you with a look that is imperious, predatory, and oppressive.{/n} "Step forward, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「実のある意見を言いたい者にはその許可を与えます。それだけの価値があるかどうか聞かせてもらいましょう」 {n}テオドラは首を傾げる。彼女の唇は冷たいほほえみに代わる。{/n}「この者は、{name}です。私の後継者の第二候補者です」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}はごう慢で、略奪的で、抑圧的な目であなたを見る。{/n}「こちらへ、{name}」
「実のある意見を言いたい者にはその許可を与える。それだけの価値があるかどうか聞かせてもらおう」{n}シオドーラは首を傾げる。彼女の唇は冷たいほほえみに代わる。{/n}「この者は、{name}です。私の後継者の第二候補者だ」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}はごう慢で、略奪的で、抑圧的な目であなたを見る。{/n}「こちらへ、{name}」

languages.text: « J'accorde cette permission à ceux qui ont quelque chose de pertinent à dire. Voyons si cela en valait la peine. » {n}Théodora penche la tête et ses lèvres s'étirent en un sourire glacial.{/n} « Je vous présente {name}, {mf|le deuxième candidat|la deuxième candidate} à ma succession. » {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} vous observe d'un regard impérieux, prédateur et oppressant.{/n} « Avancez, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "I give that permission to those with something of substance to say. Let us see if it was worth it." {n}Theodora tilts her head. Her lips stretch into a cold smile.{/n} "This is {name}, the second candidate for the title of my successor." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} regards you with a look that is imperious, predatory, and oppressive.{/n} "Step forward, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « J'accorde cette permission à ceux qui ont quelque chose de pertinent à dire. Voyons si cela en valait la peine. » {n}Théodora penche la tête et ses lèvres s'étirent en un sourire glacial.{/n} « Je vous présente {name}, {mf|le deuxième candidat|la deuxième candidate} à ma succession. » {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} vous observe d'un regard impérieux, prédateur et oppressant.{/n} « Avancez, {name}. »

languages.text: "Ich gestatte es denen, die etwas Substanzielles zu sagen haben. Bin gespannt, ob es sich gelohnt hat." {n}Theodora legt den Kopf schief. Ihre Lippen verziehen sich zu einem kalten Lächeln.{/n} "Das ist {name}, der zweite Kandidat für meine Nachfolge." {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} mustert dich mit einem gleichsam herrischen, raubtierhaften und unterdrückenden Blick.{/n} "Tretet vor, {name}."
languages.original_text: "I give that permission to those with something of substance to say. Let us see if it was worth it." {n}Theodora tilts her head. Her lips stretch into a cold smile.{/n} "This is {name}, the second candidate for the title of my successor." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} regards you with a look that is imperious, predatory, and oppressive.{/n} "Step forward, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gestatte es denen, die etwas Substanzielles zu sagen haben. Bin gespannt, ob es sich gelohnt hat." {n}Theodora legt den Kopf schief. Ihre Lippen verziehen sich zu einem kalten Lächeln.{/n} "Das ist {name}, der zweite Kandidat für meine Nachfolge." {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} mustert dich mit einem gleichsam herrischen, raubtierhaften und unterdrückenden Blick.{/n} "Tretet vor, {name}."

languages.text: "O izni sadece söyleyecek önemli bir şeyi olanlara veririm. Bakalım değmiş mi." {n}Theodora başını yana eğiyor. Dudakları gerilip soğuk bir gülümsemeye dönüşüyor.{/n} "Bu, {name}. İkinci halef adayım." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} sana amirane, yırtıcı ve sindirici bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Öne çık {name}."
languages.original_text: "I give that permission to those with something of substance to say. Let us see if it was worth it." {n}Theodora tilts her head. Her lips stretch into a cold smile.{/n} "This is {name}, the second candidate for the title of my successor." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} regards you with a look that is imperious, predatory, and oppressive.{/n} "Step forward, {name}."
